caption: Signature
description: Signature provides the signing and verification details about the record.
name: signature

annotations.caption: Annotations
annotations.description: Additional metadata associated with this agent.

signed_at.caption: Signed At
signed_at.description:
Signature creation timestamp. Value MUST conform to RFC-3339. For example:
2024-09-10T23:20:50.520Z,
2024-09-10 23:20:50.520789Z.

content_type.caption: Content Type
content_type.description: Type of the signature content bundle.

content_bundle.caption: Content Bundle
content_bundle.description: Base64-encoded signature bundle produced by the signer. It is up to the client to interpret the content of the bundle.
